author: jdcasey
msg: Fixing assembly-descriptor and assembly-component handlers/lifecycles to once again have a classifier, and changing the associated attach mojos to attach these descriptors to the main project artifact, which is now the pom itself...rather than setting the main project artifact to the descriptor, which leaves off the classifier.
